short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate Hindi to Formal English in a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing our Chrome extension designed to enhance your language communication experience. With this extension installed, you can effortlessly convert informal Hindi and English text into formal English, ensuring clarity and professionalism in your written communication. Say goodbye to linguistic barriers and elevate your language proficiency with ease.
